class.name: Vector2
class.description: 2-element structure that can be used to represent positions in 2d space or any other pair of numeric values.

method.name: Vector2
method.description: Constructs a new Vector2 from the given [code]x[/code] and [code]y[/code].

method.name: abs
method.description: Returns a new vector with all components in absolute values (i.e. positive).

method.name: angle
method.description: Returns the vector's angle in radians with respect to the X axis, or [code](1, 0)[/code] vector. Equivalent to the result of [method @GDScript.atan2] when called with the vector's [member x] and [member y] as parameters: [code]atan2(x, y)[/code].

method.name: angle_to
method.description: Returns the angle in radians between the two vectors.

method.name: angle_to_point
method.description: Returns the angle in radians between the line connecting the two points and the X coordinate.

method.name: aspect
method.description: Returns the ratio of [member x] to [member y].

method.name: bounce
method.description: Returns the vector "bounced off" from a plane defined by the given normal.

method.name: ceil
method.description: Returns the vector with all components rounded up.

method.name: clamped
method.description: Returns the vector with a maximum length.

method.name: cross
method.description: Returns the 2-dimensional analog of the cross product with the given vector.

method.name: cubic_interpolate
method.description: Cubically interpolates between this vector and [code]b[/code] using [code]pre_a[/code] and [code]post_b[/code] as handles, and returns the result at position [code]t[/code]. [code]t[/code] is in the range of [code]0.0 - 1.0[/code], representing the amount of interpolation.

method.name: direction_to
method.description: Returns the normalized vector pointing from this vector to [code]b[/code].

method.name: distance_squared_to
method.description: Returns the squared distance to vector [code]b[/code]. Prefer this function over [method distance_to] if you need to sort vectors or need the squared distance for some formula.

method.name: distance_to
method.description: Returns the distance to vector [code]b[/code].

method.name: dot
method.description: Returns the dot product with vector [code]b[/code].

method.name: floor
method.description: Returns the vector with all components rounded down.

method.name: is_normalized
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the vector is normalized.

method.name: length
method.description: Returns the vector's length.

method.name: length_squared
method.description: Returns the vector's length squared. Prefer this method over [method length] if you need to sort vectors or need the squared length for some formula.

method.name: linear_interpolate
method.description: Returns the result of the linear interpolation between this vector and [code]b[/code] by amount [code]t[/code]. [code]t[/code] is in the range of [code]0.0 - 1.0[/code], representing the amount of interpolation.

method.name: move_toward
method.description: Moves the vector toward [code]to[/code] by the fixed [code]delta[/code] amount.

method.name: normalized
method.description: Returns the vector scaled to unit length. Equivalent to [code]v / v.length()[/code].

method.name: project
method.description: Returns the vector projected onto the vector [code]b[/code].

method.name: reflect
method.description: Returns the vector reflected from a plane defined by the given normal.

method.name: rotated
method.description: Returns the vector rotated by [code]phi[/code] radians. See also [method @GDScript.deg2rad].

method.name: round
method.description: Returns the vector with all components rounded to the nearest integer, with halfway cases rounded away from zero.

method.name: slerp
method.description: Returns the result of spherical linear interpolation between this vector and [code]b[/code], by amount [code]t[/code]. [code]t[/code] is in the range of [code]0.0 - 1.0[/code], representing the amount of interpolation. [b]Note:[/b] Both vectors must be normalized.

method.name: slide
method.description: Returns the component of the vector along a plane defined by the given normal.

method.name: snapped
method.description: Returns the vector snapped to a grid with the given size.

method.name: tangent
method.description: Returns a perpendicular vector.

members.member: The vector's X component. Also accessible by using the index position [code][0][/code].
The vector's Y component. Also accessible by using the index position [code][1][/code].
